projects.title: Stichting Land van Horne
projects.description:
responsibilities:

- Design and  Installation of a new workplace Citrix infrastructure environment located inside a Prodware datacenter (Citrix XenApp 6.5 with Citrix Provisioning Server, Citrix NetScaler and RES PowerFuse.)

- Installation (and upgrades) of applications on the new environment

- migration File-, Database- and E-mail environment.

- Create a new Windows based image for 400 thin client  workplaces.

- Installation of 150 new thin clients on 20+ locations and the upgrade (image, monitors and internal memory) of 250 existing thin clients.

- Creating documentation and handover to the Prodware support organization.

profile_positions.description:
Conduct detailed discovery meetings, collect requirements and gain mutual understanding of customers services needs followed by positioning services solutions.

Drive pre-sales execution to meet and exceed identified services revenue and customer success targets

Facilitate services contracting and negotiation activities for services solutions including authoring of proposals, contracts and/or statement of work (SOWs) in close collaboration with cross functional business operations, accounting, revenue recognition and legal teams.

Alignment, engagement and development of trusted partnerships with account teams in the Benelux

Craft customer pre-sales assets and work with internal cross-functional teams to refine existing and develop new Go To Market assets

Manage relationship with local delivery partners

Help drive customer references and case studies
profile_positions.title: Account Partner - Professional Services Sales

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Revenue & bookings targets in the Benelux, UKI and Nordics region. Align with sales account teams to advise on project and services approach to drive the right customer success.

Responsible for successful positioning and selling of services by ensuring the right mix of services, training and support offerings are included in the software sales cycle.

Responsible as people manager for a team of 12 Architects, Consultants and Project Managers assigned to the region

Overall responsible for successful delivery of project in the region including attending steering group meetings, managing escalations and act as main point of contact for anything related to professional services
profile_positions.title: Manager Professional Services Benelux, UKI and Nordics

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:

Responsible for the successful positioning, selling, planning, controlling and managing EMEA largest, most complex customer projects/programs which have high strategic impact to the company.

Responsible for ensuring the right mix of services, training and support offerings are included with our Key and Named Accounts projects. Engage with the sales, account teams and Professional  and Technical Service leaders in regions in early stage deal shaping and sizing.

Responsible for making sure the right ‘success team’ is formed for successful project outcomes. I work with the regional PS leaders to help allocate the right resources and skills for the strategic projects. Manage and coach key stakeholders during the stages of development of the project commercial and delivery plan.

Responsible for projects pipe & bookings growth in the Key Account and (larger) Named Account segments. Align with sales account teams to  advise on project and services approach to drive the right customer outcome and customer project success.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Senior Project Manager - Key & Large Named Accounts

profile_positions.description:
Commvault is a recognized global leader in enterprise backup, recovery, and data management across any hybrid environment.
Commvault’s converged data management solution redefines what backup means for the progressive enterprise through solutions that protect, manage and use their most critical asset — their data.
Founded in 1996, Commvault is publicly traded (NASDAQ: CVLT) and headquartered in Tinton Falls, New Jersey.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Europe North

profile_positions.description:
Prodware is Microsoft’s leading partner in the EMEA area and Sage’s leading partner in French speaking countries. The Group's 20,000 clients are supported by nearly 1,550 employees in 14 countries, and we have services available in over 75 countries.
 
Prodware is the reference provider of globalIT solutions. The Group has offices in 14 countries and benefits from solid strategic allances. It supports companies in their international expansion.
 
As a corporate citizen, Prodware supports its clients’ sustainable development through its GreenItude services. The Group has always put its staff members at the heart of its strategy through an ambitious HR policy that promotes their fulfillment at the clients' service.

Prodware is one of the Gaia Index’s leading companies.
profile_positions.title: IT Infrastructure Project Manager

profile_positions.description: T-Systems shapes the networked future of business and society and creates value for customers, employees and investors thanks to innovative ICT solutions. Drawing on a global infrastructure of data centers and networks, T-Systems operates information and communication technology (ICT) systems for multinational corporations and public sector institutions. T-Systems provides integrated solutions for the networked future of business and society. With offices in over 20 countries and global delivery capability, the Telekom subsidiary provides support to companies in all industries. Some 50,000 employees combine expertise with ICT innovations to add significant value to customers’ core business all over the world.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Shell Global Account

profile_positions.description: Hewlett-Packard Company (HP), incorporated on February 11, 1947, is a provider of products, technologies, software, solutions and services to individual consumers, small- and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) and large enterprises, including customers in the Government, health and education sectors. Its operations are organized into seven segments: the Personal Systems Group (PSG), Services, the Imaging and Printing Group (IPG), Enterprise Servers, Storage and Networking (ESSN), HP Software, HP Financial Services (HPFS) and Corporate Investments. The Company’s offerings include personal computing and other access devices; multi-vendor customer services, including infrastructure technology and business process outsourcing, technology support and maintenance, application development and support services and consulting and integration services, and imaging and printing-related products and services.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager
